alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 6:27PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jackson and southeastern Pennington Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 627 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Potato Creek, or 24 miles southwest of Kadoka, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Potato Creek, Wanblee, Interior, Hisle, Cedar Pass, George Town, Eagle Nest Butte, Intersection of Highway 73 and White River, Snake Butte and northeastern Pine Ridge Reservation. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 132 and 143. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
